System requirements[edit]

WindowsmacOS (OS X)Linux
Windows
Minimum
Operating system (OS)
Processor (CPU) 2.8 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
System memory (RAM) 3 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 2 GB
Video card (GPU) Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge)
Nvidia since 2006 (GeForce 8)
AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000)
DirectX 9.0c compatible
macOS (OS X)
Minimum
Operating system (OS) 10.8
Processor (CPU) 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
System memory (RAM) 3 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 2 GB
Video card (GPU) OpenGL 3.2+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
Linux
Minimum Recommended
Operating system (OS) Ubuntu - glibc 2.15+ 32/64-bit
Processor (CPU) 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
System memory (RAM) 3 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 2 GB
Video card (GPU) OpenGL 3.2+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
